author: dwoods
msg: GERONIMO-4410 another API update.  Patch from Jeremy Bauer.

author: arkurth
msg: Added code to configure the eth0 connection using the value of vmprofile.virtualswitch0 for VMware GSX images.
Removed condition during load that prevented the management node from checking if a VM is responding to ssh during the first 15 iterations of a checking loop. This should speed up loads.
Removed Windows OS post-load tasks from vmware.pm. These were being done twice because new.pm calls the OS module's post_load() subroutine after the provisioning module's load() subroutine returns.

author: chabotc
msg: This patch changes the way the service classes are initiated and checked. If the configuration key for the service is empty it'll now automatically trigger a NOT_IMPLEMENTED response, this way poeple using shindig don't have to implement these them selves
